title: 06 October 2015 - Road improvement scheme in Newtownards set to begin (Department for Regional ...
text: ( Source : Department for Regional Development ) TransportNI has announced that a Â£140, 000 road improvement scheme for Newtownards is set to begin on Saturday 10 October . ~ Tuesday, 6 October 2015 Work on carriageway resurfacing at A20 / A21
